msbt.message: ! Happy New Year!Let's make it another fab one!
Haaappyyy New Year!<10_4 /> This is the one! I don't know what it's the one for, but I'm SO excited to find out!
Happy New Year! Let's fill up this whole year with happiness, and me being famous, and love all around!
Happy New Year, ! Hope it's a great one for you!
Happy New Year! Here's to another year of fun times here on !
